category.name: Integration.TCAA
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TCAA_mapping_RevID
preference.preference_description: Through this option it is possible to configure TCAA in order to assign item revision ID from AutoCAD drawing revision number during first save in Teamcenter, revise and save as new item operations. By default item revision ID is generated by Teamcenter according to current business naming rules. Possible values: 0 - item revision ID is assigned by Teamcenter (Default) 1 - item revision ID is derived from AutoCAD revision number only during the first save in Teamcenter 2 - item revision ID is derived from AutoCAD revision number during first save in Teamcenter and during revise (available starting from TCAI 11.2) 3 - item revision ID is derived from AutoCAD revision number during first save in Teamcenter, revise and save as new item (available starting from TCAI 11.2)
